thread.section_title: Niel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: classy economic
thread.title_full: classy economic - Review of Niel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Masi T
title: classy economic
text:
location in a local area with many cafes, bars, bistro, bakeries, grocery, hypermarket, daily fish market...
Staff polite and helpful
cleanliness and facilities is quit fine...
its price is really worth it for all its best...
the only negative point is breakfast, but outside there are many places to replace it...
Room Tip: small rooms with classic style and tiny wooden furniture makes you more feel the French experience... See more room tips
